thought: To craft a lime_stained_glass, I need to craft 8 glasses and 1 lime dye. I already have 1 lime dye, so I will start by crafting glass. Glass can be made by smelting sand, so I will smelt one of the 8 sands at slot 32 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 32 to slot 11 with quantity 1
